maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.orig: Cave time! ... Wait, there's running water down here?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.text: Il est temps de faire une autre grotte ! ... Attends, il y a de l'eau qui coule ici ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.orig: That's... weird, considering there are lakes out there. You'd think everything would flood.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.text: C'est... très étrange, quand on sait qu'il y a des lacs dehors. Normalement tout devrait être inondé ici.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.orig: I suppose you could make it work by carefully crafting the area... somehow?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-01.json/enti.text: Ou alors... si on construit cet endroit bien comme il faut... Peut-être que ça pourrait marcher ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.orig: What's up with that name anyway?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.text: D'ailleurs, c'est quoi le truc avec ce nom ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.orig: That should be all for this level, right?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.text: Ça devrait être tout pour ce niveau, non ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.orig: By the way!\. Did you know that worms have five hearts?\. Like...\. real earth worms do.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.text: D'ailleurs,\. à propos des vers de terre. Tu savais qu'ils avaient cinq cœurs ?\. Genre...\. les vrais vers de terre.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.orig: I mean...\. they are not quite as complex as human hearts, but still!
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.text: Je veux dire...\. ils ne sont pas aussi complexes qu'un cœur humain, mais quand même !

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.orig: Makes you wonder about the anatomy of those Sandworms.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-02.json/enti.text: On se demande bien quel est l'anatomie de ces vers de sables.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: That must be the red sandworm, better be careful!
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ça doit être le ver de sable rouge ! Fais attention !

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I suppose the \c[3]\v[item.362.name]\c[0] is the strange item the guard wants to see, right?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: J'imagine que ce \c[3]\v[item.362.name]\c[0] est l'objet étrange que le garde veut voir, non ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Oh, is that a direct link?
OH!\. You're the other member from the First Scholars, non?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: OH !\. tu es l'autre membre des Premiers Érudits, c'est ça ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Très bien!\. So you'll join our party, oui?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Très bien !\. Donc tu vas rejoindre notre groupe, oui ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: So where are you two right now?
Uhm...\. Lea and I are currently in the Maroon Tree Cave...
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Heu...\. Lea et moi on est dans la grotte du marronnier...

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Wait!\. You started that quest already?
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Ah non !\. Vous avez déjà commencé la quête ?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: It looks like we almost finished it.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: On dirait aussi qu'on l'a presque finie.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Aww man...\. I wanted to do that quest with you!
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Oh nooon~...\. Je voulais qu'on la fasse ensemble !

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I-\.I'm sorry, I didn't know you had that planned.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: J-Je suis désolé, je ne pensais pas que c'était ce que tu avais prévu.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Non, it's fine! Pas de problème!
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Non, c'est pas grave ! Pas de problème !

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I'll quickly rush through that quest myself!
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je vais juste me précipiter pour faire la quête toute seule !

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: You two just wait for me, d'accord?

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Mince...\. Je me sens mal maintenant.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Uhm...\. You mean I don't have to?\. W-\.Well...
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Hum...\. Tu veux dire que je devrais pas ?\. B-Bon...

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: Let's just go back to the cave entrance and show the item to the guard.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Retournons à l'entrée de la grotte et montrons l'objet au garde.

maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.orig: I think the cave interior is instanced, but we might be able to meet Emilie outside.
maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-03.json/enti.text: Je pense que l'intérieur de la grotte est instancié... On devrait attendre Emilie dehors.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-01.json/entit.orig: See, I told you the lilies were safe.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-01.json/entit.text: Tu vois, je te l'avais dit que les fleurs de lys pouvaient nous porter.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: en_US
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: en_US
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: en_US
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: en_US
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: fr_FR

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: STOP HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: STOP HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Vous besoin \c[3]Passe de Altesse\c[0] si vous vouloir entrer grotte.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You find Eldress in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], Shad village to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Toi trouver Altesse à \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0], Village Shad à l'\c[3]ouest\c[0] !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: STOP HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: STOP HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Vous besoin \c[3]Passe de Altesse\c[0] si vous vouloir entrer grotte.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Hey Lea, do you want to tackle the Maroon Tree Quest by yourself now?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Hé, Lea, maintenant tu veux faire la Quête du Marronnier toute seule ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I thought you wanted to meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] north of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je pensais que tu voulais rencontrer \c[3]C'tron\c[0] au nord de \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You forgot? Better don't let the poor guy wait for too long.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Tu l'as oublié ? Vaut mieux ne pas le faire attendre trop longtemps.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: STOP HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: STOP HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Vous besoin \c[3]Passe de Altesse\c[0] si vous vouloir entrer grotte.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oh! Is that the pass?\. So Human must be here to help \c[3]defeat Sandworm\c[0]!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oh ! Ça être passe ?\. Donc humain doit être ici pour aider \c[3]vaincre Vers de Sable\c[0] !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: GREAT!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: SUPER !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Then please enter Cave and defeat all Sandworm!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Alors veuillez entrer Grotte et vaincre tous les Vers de sable !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: That is all!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: C'est tout !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: WAIT!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: ATTENDEZ !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Shad almost forgot!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Shad avoir presque oublié !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: There is very strong \c[3]red sandworm\c[0] in cave!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Il y a \c[3]ver de sable rouge\c[0] très fort dans grotte !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Please defeat that worm! Most important, because very dangerous to tree!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: S'il vous plait, vaincre ce vers ! Très important, car très dangereux pour arbre !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Red Sandworm will also drop \c[3]strange item\c[0]! Show me item to prove you defeated red sandworm, ok?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ver de Sable Rouge va aussi laisser \c[3]objet étrange\c[0] ! Vous montrer objet à moi pour prouver que vous avoir vaincu ver de sable rouge, OK ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: ALRIGHT!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: ALORS TOUT ÊTRE BON !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Good luck, Human!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Bonne chance, Humain !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Gosh...\. what a loud fellow.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Hé ben...\. il parle fort ce bougre.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Humain très gentil, toujours aider nous pour vaincre Vers de sable !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Mais Vers de sable toujours revenir, très énervant !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Anyway, together we can protect tree!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: En tout cas, ensemble, nous pouvoir protéger arbre !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: THANK YOU, HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: MERCI BEAUCOUP, HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Did you kill all Sandworm?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Vous avoir tué tous les vers de sable ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I see you have strange item!\. Please give me!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je vois que vous avoir objet étrange !\. Donner à moi s'il vous plait !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: \v[item.362.name]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: \v[item.362.name]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Strange item very good for Maroon Tree!\. Putting in earth helps to grow!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Objet étrange très bon pour Marronnier !\. Planter au sol aider arbre à pousser

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Wait...\. so I guess that stuff was...\. dung?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Attends...\. donc ça veut dire que ce truc c'était du...\. fumier ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Good thing we got rid of it.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Bonne chose qu'on s'en soit débarrassé.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: HUMAN!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: HUMAIN !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Please hand me pass.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Donner moi passe s'il vous plait !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I make note for Eldress!\. You can now go and get \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0]!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Moi écrire note pour Altesse !\. Vous pouvoir partir et obtenir \c[3]\v[item.237.name]\c[0] !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Thanks a lot for help.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Merci beaucoup pour aide.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: BYE HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: BYE HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Bonjour!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Bonjour !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Gotcha, you little runaways!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je vous ai trouvés, bandes de petit filous !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Salut !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Hi Emilie, it's nice to finally meet you!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Salut Emilie, c'est sympa de pouvoir enfin se rencontrer !
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.note: people noted the similarity with dreams, except ... it's not said by the same person

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oui!\. Nice to meet you, too!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oui !\. Pareil pour moi !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: And again...\. I'm sorry we didn't wait for you.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Et sinon...\. Encore désolé de ne pas t'avoir attendu.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: No really, it's fine.\. We never made any plans, anyway.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Non vraiment, c'est pas grave.\. Il n'y a jamais rien eu de prévu.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: And I can understand why you'd play ahead.\. I've been offline for quite some time.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Et je peux comprendre que vous ayez avancé sans moi.\. J'ai été hors-ligne pendant un moment.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: It's just that...\. I really had to wrap up everything for that project.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: C'est juste que...\. il fallait que je fasse quelque chose pour finir ce projet.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Gosh...\. Studies keeping you busy, huh?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oh...\. C'est les études qui te prennent du temps, hein ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oui, oui.\. And you don't even know half of the story yet, isn't that right, Lea?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oui, oui.\. Et tu ne connais même pas encore la moitié de l'histoire, pas vrai, Lea ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Anyway, work is over now and I've got plenty of free time! I'm so ready!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Mais bon, le boulot est fait et j'ai plein de temps libre. Je suis prête !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I'll try my best to beat that cave as quickly as possible.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je vais mettre le turbo pour faire cette grotte aussi vite que possible.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: No rush! I suggest we meet in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] once you're done.\. Sounds good?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pas besoin de se précipiter ! Je propose que l'on se retrouve à \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] en face du \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] quand tu auras fini.\. Ça te va ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oui, très bien! See you soon!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oui, très bien ! À bientôt !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Bye!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Bye !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Wow, she sure is full of energy!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Wow, elle est vraiment pleine d'énergie !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Anyway! There is no reason to hurry, but I guess we can slowly head back to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Sinon, on a le temps, j'imagine que l'on peut rentrer calmement à \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0], non ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Let's go then!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Alors allons-y !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You decided to meet up with Emilie in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Vous avez décidé de vous retrouver avec Emilie en face du \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] de \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0].

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Humain très gentil, toujours aider nous pour vaincre Vers de sable !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Mais Vers de sable toujours revenir, très énervant !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Anyway, together we can protect tree!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: En tout cas, ensemble, nous pouvoir protéger arbre !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: THANK YOU, HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: MERCI BEAUCOUP, HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: HUMAN!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: HUMAIN !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You must not enter!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Toi pas devoir entrer !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Finally, our party reached the blooming oasis to the east!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Enfin, notre groupe atteignit l'oasis bleue à l'est !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: The maroon tree in all its majestic glory was but within a stone's throw!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Et le grand marronnier, dans toute sa splendeur majestueuse, ne se tenait qu'à quelques mètres !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Lea!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Lea !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Wait!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Attends !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Indeed, the soothing breeze and calm waters were inviting for a little break.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Effectivement, le courant d'air frais et les eaux calmes rendaient une petite pause très tentante.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Alas, there was no time to waste! We had to continue on our journey!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Hélas, il n'y avait pas de temps à perdre ! Nous devions continuer notre voyage !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Why?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig:
And so we kept playing.\.
Traveling the Playground.\.
Hoping for memories to return.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text:
Et donc nous continuions à jouer.
À parcourir le Terrain de Jeu.
Et d'espérer que les souvenirs reviennent.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: There we are! That must be the \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0]!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Nous y voilà ! Ça doit être le \c[3]Marronnier\c[0] !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Such a nice tree.\. Really sticks out!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Il est sympa cet arbre.\. On ne peut vraiment pas le rater !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Whyyyyy?!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pourquoiii ?!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Lily
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Lily

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Priel
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Priel

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Hi...
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Salut...

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Gone again?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Il est encore parti ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I swear one day, I'm going to kill that guy....
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je te jure qu'un jour, je vais lui faire la peau à ce type...

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Adding person\s[7]......
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ajout d'une personne\s[7]......

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Reize
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Reize

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Uhm...\. Hello!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Hum...\. Bonjour !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: YOU!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: TOI !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Why?!\. Wait!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pourquoi ?!\. Attends !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Where are you NOW?!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: T'es passé OÙ maintenant ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Well...\. you see...
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ben euh...\. tu vois...

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Somebody was so kind to tell me I was heading in the wrong direction!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Quelqu'un m'a gentiment dit que j'allais dans la mauvaise direction !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: TELL ME SOMETHING NEW!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: DIS-MOI QUELQUE CHOSE DE NOUVEAU !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You were supposed to WAIT!\. AGAIN!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Tu devais nous ATTENDRE !\. ENCORE !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: It's okay!\. I'm very close to Rhombus Square now...\. I think.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: C'est bon !\. Je suis tout près de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]...\. je crois.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: REIZE STOP MOVING!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: REIZE, RESTE OÙ TU ES !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Rhombus Square was close to that...\. \c[3]jungle\c[0], wasn't it?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] est bien tout près de cette...\. \c[3]jungle\c[0]. C'est ça ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: No...\. no it wasn't.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Non...\. non c'est pas ça.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oh crap, they're closing in again!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Rah mince, ils se rapprochent encore !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You're still being followed?!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ils te suivent encore ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Yeah...\. Also there are these \c[3]huge mushrooms\c[0] everywhere!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ouais...\. Et il y a ces \c[3]champignons énormes\c[0] partout !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Argh, where am I?!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ahh, où est-ce ce que je suis ?!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Wait!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Attends !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Reize, for the love of crap, STAY WHERE YOU ARE!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Reize, POUR LA DERNIÈRE FOIS, RESTE OÙ TU ES !!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Sorry, I gotta run!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Désolé, il faut que je m'enfuie !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: NOOO!!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: NOOOON !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Lily
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Lily

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Priel
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Priel

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You know what?\. Maybe we should just leave him to his fate!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Tu sais quoi ?\. Peut-être qu'on devrait juste l'abandonner à son sort.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I feel he deserves to be smashed by whatever is following him!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Il ne mérite rien d'autre que de se faire frapper par ceux qui le suivent !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Come on, don't be that way...
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Aller, ne sois pas comme ça...

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Why are those enemies following him so aggressively anyway?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pourquoi est-ce que ces ennemis n'en finissent pas de le poursuivre ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: This really doesn't seem normal, right Lea?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Ce n'est vraiment pas normal, hein Lea ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: I bet Ivo's up to something again.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Je parie que Ivo est encore derrière tout ça.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Why?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Oh...?\. Right, we never told you about Ivo.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Oh... ?\. C'est vrai, on ne t'a jamais parlé d'Ivo.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: He's a friend of ours.\. He's not in this world, though.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: C'est un ami à nous.\. Il n'est pas dans ce monde, par contre.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Instead he's sort of...\. checking what we're doing.\. I think?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: À la place, il, disons...\. garde un œil sur ce qu'on fait.\. C'est ça ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Who knows what he's up to, really.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Qui sait ce qu'il a vraiment en tête, pour être franc.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: In practice he's like an annoying voice in your head that talks to you occasionally.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: En pratique il est comme une voix agaçante dans la tête qui te parle occasionnellement.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Sounds like a very helpful fellow.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Il m'a l'air très utile comme compagnon.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: In any case, let's not give up on Reize okay?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: En tout cas, il faut pas que l'on abandonne Reize, OK ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: Fine.\. We'll give him one last chance.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Bon.\. On lui donne une dernière chance.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.orig: You better hurry before he wanders off again!
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-02.json/entit.text: Tu ferais mieux de te dépêcher avant qu'il ne s'égare à nouveau !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: Phew, it's hotter'n blazes here, tell you what.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: C'te chaleur ici va m'tuer, j'te l'dis.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: But the flora's quite a sight, ain't it?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: Mais c'est qu'la flore d'ici est assez jolie, non ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: Well, how 'bout y'all? Explorin' comin' along?
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: Et sinon, comment qu'tu vas ? Ça s'passe bien ton exploration végétale ?

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: Glad ta hear it. Y'all be good now!

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: C'est une chute d'eau assez impressionnante !

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: You really wouldn't expect such an abundance of water in a desert area.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: Qu'il y ait une telle abondance d'eau dans un désert est assez... curieux.

maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.orig: Whoa, look at this! Better watch your step.
maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-03.json/entit.text: Ouah, regarde ça ! Faut mieux faire attention là où tu mets les pieds !
